name: Feedly Lite
description: A lite version of the Magazine View. The Sidebar is fixed and the buttons moved to the right.
additional_info:
I like the old titles view in feedly but they are not supporting it anymore...
So I modified the magazine view.

Tested with Google Chrome.
For Firefox user add the following code.
@-moz-document url-prefix("http://www.feedly.com/home") {
CSS_HERE
}

Setting: URLs starting with http://www.feedly.com/home

---
- Removed div#storeHolder { display:none !important; } / so you are able to add new sources
- Modified to hide the amazon part (02/11/2013)
